basics.name: Debajyoti Mahanta
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full stack developer with over 10 years of experaince spaning from Java to .NET to Clojure. Have help design and develop highly resposive distributed systems. Help build recomendation and search engines for global scaled applications. A  good team player and enjoy working in agile and global distributed teams. Eager to learn and adapt with the ever changing technology world.

work.summary: Work as a part of the Aon Corp System Knwoledge Team. Had resposbility to lead a team of onshoare and offshore developer to build the entire knowlede shareing and content management platform.
highlights: Leading the migration to micro architecture from legacy backend systems.
Design and develop the Tool Recomendation Engine using Collabaritvity Filtering
Development of realtime ternary search tree using Pub/Sub pattern for effective, fast and easily sclable solution
Reposbile for uptime of glboal intrnate solution, with distributed architecture. Deployed across 3 continetns. Design and implement DevOps to support agile methdology and continous delivery
Portfolio Lead responsible for operation and delivery of complex and diverse application portfolio  of 20+ applications
Lead the first agile developement team for client. Worked as a Scrum Master for multiiple projects
Designed and implemented multiple projects for distributed scalable n layer 3 tier architecture  with a complex multi-server architecture based on Microsoft .NET technology.
Responsible for working with client to create business case for project evaluation
Worked with IT security to implement OWASP based guidelines and security governance.

Design, develop, and implement a web based global expense management system in Lotus  Domino. A workflow based application for expense approval invoiced across business unit with an   real time feed to PS.

Developed and supported  a B2B solution to process Worker Compensation applications of  insurance. The project supported with no SLA breach and escalation and as a result the client   signed a three-year deal with their vendor.

work.summary: Joined HCL as Junior Software Engieer from Campus Recrutment. Worked in multiple times, starting from Java, SAP and Lotus Notes. Worked in a number of integration proejct and mutliple clients
highlights: Lead a project for implementation of a Global Employee Survey project for RoHS compliance  â€¢ Responsible for support of a critical Engineering Change request system, which required working   across multiple teams from various technologies.
Developed Java based connector for Lotus Notes and SAP project; this implementation was  showcased in IBM On Demand Business case.
Support and developed outage management system for a US electrical giant
Worked as a member of the development team for IBM DB2 Lotus Notes based Loan Processing  System
Youngest member of the team to handle an enterprise application and provide support to onshore  team, which was greatly appreciated by both the client and manager

awards.title: Best Value To Employee
awards.summary: Three-year plan results in hub for knowledge sharing and collaboration. http://www.ragan.com/Awards/SpecialEdition/135.aspx

references.name: Yvon Milano
references.reference: He is that rare mix of soft  and technical skills that you   always want to have in your   team. I would trust Deba with   my most critical application   development projects..

references.name: Dave Sullivan
references.reference: I would highly recommend  Deba as someone to fill a wide   variety of shoes, especially   those of a senior support lead,   senior technical architect, or   senior business analyst. I   think Deba's true shine comes   through when he has the   ability to combine  these roles.
